entry.title: Running 16-bit DOS CLI tools on Windows 10 64-bit (without DOSBox)

link.title: Running 16-bit DOS CLI tools on Windows 10 64-bit (without DOSBox)

entry.summary: I recently found a real treasure: An archive containing many of the tools used at Sierra On-Line to create their games. All of these are 16-bit DOS command-line tools. So I opened a command prompt and tried to run one of them. Only to receive this message:
